definition: to check sth and accept it

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

sentences.english: That is the tousle-haired island baker collectinghis flour.
sentences.chinese: 那個頭髮蓬亂的島上面包師傅正在點收他的麪粉。

sentences.english: Records may be registered at more than one level or aggregation within a records system.
sentences.chinese: 文件可以多層級或聚合的方式點收至檔案系統中。

sentences.english: IPC income from West India (2) now goes to Calcutta.
sentences.chinese: 西印度的2點收入歸加爾各答。

sentences.english: The NASDAQ rose 25 points to close at 1,955.
sentences.chinese: 納斯達克上漲了25點在1955點收盤。

sentences.english: That is the tousle-haired island baker collecting his flour.
sentences.chinese: 那個頭髮蓬亂的島上面包師傅正在點收他的麪粉。

sentences.english: Registration is a way of formalizing the capture of the record into the records system.
sentences.chinese: 點收是一種將文件蒐集到檔案系統的正式化方法。

sentences.english: On Wall Street today, the Dow gained 82 points to close at 9,217.
sentences.chinese: 今天華爾街，道瓊斯上漲82點收盤在9217點。

definition: to lose what one has just obtained (idiom)
(of a stock price or market index) currently higher than at the previous day's close
Shanghai Stock Exchange (SSE), abbr. for 上海證券交易所|上海证券交易所[Shang4 hai3 Zheng4 quan4 Jiao1 yi4 suo3]

pinyin: Shang4 zheng4 zong1 he2 zhi3 shu4
